overview: Dr. Deepak Raheja is a senior Psychiatrist & Psychotherapist who has been associated with the field of mental health for over a decade. He uses an eclectic healing approach, combining the medical aspects with a rich experience in Hypnotherapy, Spiritual Counseling and alternate healing practices. Dr Raheja works with people in crisis, amalgamating various facets of psychopharmacology and techniques of counseling and psychotherapy, guiding people through the process of crisis intervention and resolution. Dr Deepak Raheja is a senior consultant Psychiatrist to many diplomatic missions and a Senior Advisor to many Media Houses including CNN, IBN, NDTV, Doordarshan , Hindustan Times, Times Of India etc. Dr Deepak Raheja has many research papers to his credit including pioneering ICMR funded research on Neuropsychological deficits of Chronic Cannabis Abuse. Dr Raheja is an active member of the Indian Psychiatric Society and has attended many workshops at various international Forums including being an active member of the American Psychiatric Society. He is well traveled and works in close association with many Psychiatric Departments in Europe and America on various issues/projects in the field of Mental Health.
